Title: Code First Template Generator
Description: The tool will  generate the .cs code files from the control property excel , created by Control property generator tool.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
  1. This is available as a Visual Studio Add in.
  2. This tool which will generate the .cs code files from the control property excel , created by Control property generator tool. (http://controlpropertygenerator.codeplex.com/).
  3. The .cs page files will have definition of all the controls and their identification.
  4. A separate .cs page file gets created for each sheet in the excel.
  5. The .cs files can then be included in the project by first making them visible via click of "Show All Files" icon on the project.
  6. This will ease the job of the coder as the control will now be directly available in code and they will now just have to focus on business logic only.
TagList: code first,automation,template generation,control page file,control property too,
